entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 02:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
